name: BuildBundleFileSize.Attributes
desc: The attributes that describe a Build Bundle File Sizes resource.

items.name: deviceModel
items.desc: A string that identifies the Apple device model.

items.name: downloadBytes
items.desc: An integer value that represents the download size of the build bundle in bytes.

items.name: installBytes
items.desc: An integer value that represents the installation size of the build bundle in bytes.

items.name: osVersion
items.desc: A string that identifies the OS version supported by the app or App Clip.
